name: Correo Solucion S.A.P.I. de C.V.
description: Operator of a sports e-commerce platform intended for sports products. The company's platform features sports products like running shoes, tennis rackets, swimsuits, bicycles, and travel hammocks among others from renowned brands at a discounted price, enabling customers to buy sports goods and accessories online at accessible prices in a hassle-free manner.
one_liner: Operator of a sports e-commerce platform intended for sports products. The company's platform features sports products like running shoes, tennis rackets, swimsuits, bicycles, and travel hammocks among others from renowned brands at a discounted price, enabling customers to buy sports goods and accessories online at accessible prices in a hassle-free manner.
